name: spur-monorepo
description: Monorepo for Spur Assignment - Backend (Fastify + TypeScript) and Frontend (SvelteKit)

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w backend" "npm run dev -w frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w frontend && npm run build -w backend
scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w backend && npm run lint -w frontend
scripts.format: npm run format -w backend && npm run format -w frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist backend/node_modules frontend/.svelte-kit frontend/node_modules node_modules
